segments.text: I see the woman standing there, so focused on polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, somehow the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the edge like a tiny waterfall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she doesn’t notice the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical, watching her so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those kids are up to something mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously perched on that stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of anxiety thinking about him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, eager and expectant, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don’t see the danger in their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
